Knife-Mate: A smart cutting board that helps you chop ingredients perfectly.
Knife-Bot: A robotic knife sharpener that sharens your knives with ease.
Knife-Vision: A device that uses augmented reality to display the best cutting techniques for different ingredients.
Knife-Caddy: A portable cutting board with built-in storage for your knives, making them easy to transport and organize.
Knife-Craft: A subscription service that delivers unique, handcrafted knives to your doorstep every month.
